meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1020.

td.p: Jonathan Saltzberg, a copy editor & proofreader from Woodmere, New York
Margaret McGeorge, a clerk & typist from Slidell, Louisiana
George Roche, a director of voter registration originally from Fleetwood, Pennsylvania

tr.td: FAMOUS FAMILIES
BIRDS
SONGS
SPORTS
COSMETICS
VOCABULARY

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Jonathan: Who is Michael Reagan?)

Maureen Reagan

MargaretJonathan
')
